Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than what others have paid for it. Considering its true value and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this opportunity to you for $120. This price not only ensures you get great value for your money but also allows me to fairly compensate for the investment made into creating such a high-quality product. I trust you'll find it worth every penny. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
